name: Europe
overview: Europe is one of the most popular study destinations for international students due to its high-quality education system, affordable tuition fees, globally recognised degrees, and strong career opportunities. Many European countries offer English-taught programs, scholarships, and post-study work options, making Europe an excellent choice for global education and international exposure.

whyStudyInEurope.title: Globally Recognised Universities
whyStudyInEurope.description: Europe is home to some of the world's top-ranked universities known for academic excellence, innovation, and research-driven education.

whyStudyInEurope.title: Affordable & Tuition-Free Options
whyStudyInEurope.description: Countries like Germany offer tuition-free or low-cost public universities, making Europe highly affordable compared to other destinations.

whyStudyInEurope.title: English-Taught Programs
whyStudyInEurope.description: Thousands of programs across Europe are available in English, especially in countries like Germany, Netherlands, Sweden, and Finland.

whyStudyInEurope.title: Post-Study Work Opportunities
whyStudyInEurope.description: Many European countries offer stay-back options after graduation to gain international work experience.

whyStudyInEurope.title: Work While Studying
whyStudyInEurope.description: International students are allowed to work part-time during studies to support their living expenses.

whyStudyInEurope.title: Schengen Travel Benefits
whyStudyInEurope.description: Students can travel freely across 27 Schengen countries, enhancing cultural exposure and networking opportunities.

eligibility.notes: Some programs may require entrance exams, portfolio, or work experience.

work_rights: Part-time work allowed during studies (usually 20 hours per week depending on country).
